participant_1.background:
I found a romance novel that my girlfriend would love, but I'm afraid to tell her about it.
i get my nails done every saturday.
I love a good home-cooked meal, especially when it comes from my mom's kitchen.
i try to eat healthy or i do not eat at all.
I'm glad I made the decision to pursue my passion.

participant_2.background:
I celebrated my birthday with my friends and family, and listened to a lot of country music.
i am the youngest sibling of four.
I'm not exactly rich, but I like to use my money to travel and experience new things.
I started my own business.
I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record.

content.text: Hey! Just got back from celebrating my birthday. How was your weekend?
Mine was great! I just spent it relaxing and working on my passion project.
That's awesome! I'm glad you had a good time. What kind of passion project are you working on?
I'm writing a novel. I'm really excited about it, but I'm nervous to share it with anyone.
That's great! I'm sure it's amazing. You should definitely be proud of yourself for working on it.
Thanks! I'm trying to be. I'm just afraid that my friends and family won't like it.
I'm sure they will! They're your friends and family, they're supposed to support you.
You're right. I should just show it to them and see what they think.
That's the spirit! I'm sure they'll love it.
Thanks for the encouragement! I really appreciate it.
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
